headline: American Express (AXP): $16.6 Billion Revenue and Strategic Growth in Warren Buffett’s Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of Warren Buffett’s 10 Longest-Held Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) stands against other Warren Buffett’s longest-held stocks. Warren Buffett has cemented his legacy as Wall Street’s most successful investor. During the high-flying stock market of the 1960s, he […]

headline: American Express: Continued Execution, But There Will Be Better Entry Points
summary: Despite stagnation in US commercial services, American Express is executing the plan well. Click here to read why AXP stock is a Hold.
